LightningComponentBundle.description: File display component with preview and download capabilities

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record ID
property.description: The parent record ID. Use {!recordId} to dynamically use the current record ID.

property.name: listTitle
property.label: List Title
property.description: Display name for the file list. Leave blank for 'Files'.

property.name: initialLoadAmount
property.label: Initial Files to Show
property.description: Number of files to display initially before showing View More. Default is 6.

property.name: titleTextStyle
property.label: Title Text Style
property.description: Typography style for the list title
